entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 25 April 2023
